authors.name: Faith
authors.notes: When I was making this originally I looked a lot of retro horror movie posters. The ones that were painted rather than photographed. There's a lot of the same color schemes and the composition of them are all very similar so I had a lot of fun imitating their style!

authors.name: Dan
authors.notes: We basically decided that every background character's name is Steve.

authors.name: Faith
authors.notes: Everytime I look at Nadia's car I realize how terrible it is. Its the worst model of soviet cars Dan could find and I based the color off of my own family's car which is as old as Nadia's probably is.

authors.name: Dan
authors.notes: I literally just searched Shitty Soviet Cars, and the Yugo was the first to come up and it was terrible and perfect.

authors.name: Faith
authors.notes: I really hope you get the mug reference. If you don't just google Big Hug Mug and you'll find the TV Shows it showed up in. One of which I may have slightly disturbed Dan with. ;)

authors.name: Dan
authors.notes: That fucking show... Why the fuck did I watch that?

authors.name: Faith
authors.notes: I'm half expecting theories that the lawn flamingo is responsible for all this. Look at it. All smug and pink.

authors.name: Dan
authors.notes: I did not even notice that flamingo was in there...

authors.name: Faith
authors.notes: While drawing Steve's house I looked at a lot of suburban houses and they're all grey, beige, and white. Really boring. So for the interior I made it extra colorful.

authors.name: Dan
authors.notes: In a perfect world I wouldn't have to write exposition...

authors.name: Faith
authors.notes: DO YOU LIKE GHOSTS? WE GOT GHOSTS. LOTS OF 'EM. COME ON DOWN AND PICK YOUR OWN GHOST! THIS ONES MISSING AN ARM. THIS ONE LOOKS LIKE A COCOON. BUY A GHOST!!!!

authors.name: Dan
authors.notes: Still REALLY don't like people standing around and talking. Though at least the first two and last two panels keep this page from being too boring.

authors.name: Faith
authors.notes: This is my favorite page. I just love Steve sliding out in those bottom panels.

authors.name: Dan
authors.notes: Jim and Nadia are the best of friends.

authors.name: Faith
authors.notes: Funfact: I forgot to color that candle blue the first time. I forget a lot of things.

authors.name: Dan
authors.notes: I looked up a bunch of summoning and exorcism chants in latin, but ultimately decided who cares. Maybe I'll actually put then in on a later page.

authors.name: Faith
authors.notes: Welp.

authors.name: Dan
authors.notes: RRRRRRRRRRR

authors.name: Faith
authors.notes: Jim, I know you're just trying to help, but apearing as a bunch of eye balls is not comforting.

authors.name: Dan
authors.notes: Nadia's brain hasn't been a very friendly-looking place since Jim moved in.

authors.name: Faith
authors.notes: Jim has no people skills and thus is not allowed to answer the phones.

authors.name: Dan
authors.notes: I was unsure as to how the Nadia bubbles would look when Jim's in control, but I like how they turned out.

authors.name: Faith
authors.notes: NNOOO! THAT TABLE WAS FROM STEVES GRANDMOTHER! ITS HIS ONLY NONÂ­THRIFT STORE FURNITURE!!!

authors.name: Dan
authors.notes: I looked up different forms of martial arts for certain later characters. Jim's fighting style is a bit more... basic. Punch It Really Hard.

authors.name: Faith
authors.notes: That last line? I wrote it. I was me. I can be good at things too!

authors.name: Dan
authors.notes: WELL I SEE I'M NO LONGER NEEDED HERE. FAITH CAN JUST WRITE THE WHOLE THING BY HERSELF APPARENTLY.

authors.name: Faith
authors.notes: Dan was repeatedly horrified by the second to last panel.

authors.name: Dan
authors.notes: That fucking face...

authors.name: Faith
authors.notes: Jim's eyes are actually based off of nautilus eyes which work similarly to a pinhole camera.

authors.name: Dan
authors.notes: I love how Jim looks equally as derpy as he looks creepy in the second to last panel.

authors.name: Faith
authors.notes: Nadia pls.

authors.name: Dan
authors.notes: Straight to the point.

authors.name: Faith
authors.notes: SPOOKY PAPERWORK GHOST.

authors.name: Dan
authors.notes: I feel like my diet will match Nadia's once I move out of the basement.

authors.name: Faith
authors.notes: FIN.

authors.name: Dan
authors.notes: See you next week!
